title: Kimi Ni Todoke X Aozora Yell
alternative_title: Mayuge no Kakudo wa 45° de ; 45 Degree Eyebrows ; 45° Eyebrows
status: Mayuge no Kakudo wa 45° de ; 45 Degree Eyebrows ; 45° Eyebrows
description:
Description :
        Eight-page oneshot featuring Kimi ni Todoke's homeroom teacher Kazuichi "Pin" Arai who makes a pass at two women, who happen to be Youko Sugimura and Maki, teachers at Aozora Yell's Shirato High School.
